m_szDocSumamry: PESWiki.com -- Pure Energy Systems Wiki:  Finding and Facilitating the Best Exotic Free Energy Technologies      Directory:Massive Yet Tiny (MYT) Engine From PESWiki Jump to: navigation, search <> Inventor, Raphial Morgado, stands between a conventional engine and his engine that he says has comparable power output. See comparison page on site. See also News:MYT Engine | Aviation 2.0™ "I'm not an engine design engineer, I'm a leading visionary and proponent who has followed the exotic clean energy sector for nearly a dozen years looking for real solutions. Raphial is the closest thing I know t
